description: "You asked for a video walkthrough of modernizing SharePoint Document Sets. I listened."After my carousel post on modernizing Document Sets, many of you reached out asking for a video version.Let's be honest - sometimes seeing the process in action is worth more than reading a thousand steps. Everyone consumes and learns differently.So, I've put together a complete video walkthrough showing exactly how to do the following. AKA this is what you will learn.- Add your Document Set content type to a library- Use PnP PowerShell to modernize the experience- Test the results with a real Document Set creationThis takes less than 5 minutes to implement once you've got the scripts ready to go and PnP PowerShell all installed. I am 100% finding that this small change makes a massive difference in user adoption of Document Sets.What other SharePoint features would you like to see demonstrated in a video? Let's chat about your biggest pain points below. …more
